Verhaltensbiologie Samuel Tobler About This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandocâ€™s Markdown supports; for example, a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). Usage Each bookdown chapter is an .Rmd file, and each .Rmd file can contain one (and only one) chapter. A chapter must start with a first-level heading: # A good chapter, and can contain one (and only one) first-level heading. Use second-level and higher headings within chapters like: ## A short section or ### An even shorter section. The index.Rmd file is required, and is also your first book chapter. It will be the homepage when you render the book. par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1)) plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19) Abbildung 0.1: Here is a nice figure!
